content.rendered:
MultiMedia Courses

Adobe Photoshop & Coreldraw

Learn all the skills you need to design your own graphics from start to finish with this hands-on Adode Photoshop & Coreldraw training course.

Enroll Now

Adobe illustrator

Create stunning illustrations and graphics by learning to master the tool – Adobe Illustrator in a gradual step-by-step learning approach and make a striking impression.

Enroll Now

Adobe Premiere Pro

Turn your creative ideas into amazing videos with the Adobe Premiere Pro course and craft some of the finest videos with all the amazing elements of the video-editing tool.

Enroll Now

2D and 3D Animation

An absolute upskill for creative artists to add value to their design work. Get to learn these computerized 2D and 3D Animation software techniques.

Enroll Now

VFX

Hone your skill of visualization with the Visual Effects training course and communicate your works to the audience with an exciting communication approach.

Enroll Now

Web and Graphic Designing

Develop expertise in the field of graphic and website designing with an extensive training course and prepare yourself for a thriving career in the booming industry.

Enroll Now

Digital Designing and Marketing

A comprehensive course that equips you well in all foundational aspects of designing and advertising mainly in the digital forums and makes you a job-ready professional.

Enroll Now

Visual Effects with Nuke and Flame

Learn node-based digital compositing and visual effects application with the Nuke and Flame video editing and finishing software tool for your skill upgradation in VFX.

Enroll Now

Adobe After Effects

Learn to refine your design skills with Adobe After effects training course and create incredible motion graphics and visual effects with a touch of technology and expertise to it.

Enroll Now

Audio and Video Editing

Learn some of the best video and audio editing software tools at the tips of your fingers using your personal computer, with this experiential training course.

Enroll Now

Maya Software

A 3D modeling and animation program, offering all the tools needed to produce professional and quality results that can be used for 3D printing & graphics.

Enroll Now

Adobe Dreamweaver

Design and develop beautifully customized web pages. It blends a robust design surface and code editor that helps easily code, design, and manage sites.

Enroll Now

Adobe InDesign

Create beautiful graphic designs with typography from the world’s top foundries and imagery and leverage the industry-leading layout and page design software for print and digital media.

Enroll Now
